alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 17 at 8:57AM MST until January 17 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of visibility less than one-quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Freezing fog will cause hard-to-see slick spots on area roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If you are driving Wyoming Highway 789 or US Highway 20/26, be prepared for sudden reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
